description: Seeking contractors for repair and maintenance of postage machines and letter opening machines.
duration_in_months: When awarding a contract, the estimated duration will be around 6 months
full_summary:
# Request for Information (RFI): Repair and Maintenance of Postage Machines and Letter Opening Machines

### Official Title (`English`): 
Postage Machines and Letter Opening Machines: Request for Information (RFI)

### Official Title (`French`): 
Machines à affranchir et à ouvrir le courrier : demande de renseignements (DR)

### Contract Reference Number:
 cb-8309-15560685

### Alert Note:
This Request for Information (RFI) has since expired and closed.

### Response Due Date: 
EXPRIRED
[Details not required for Expired tenders]

### RFI Description:
A Request for Information (RFI) was issued to solicit feedback from industry stakeholders regarding services to repair and maintain postage machines and letter opening machines used by Service Canada. The machines in question are used in various mail Rooms at different locations within the Western Region.

### Authorized Source:
[Contract Reference Code: 100024081](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8309/100024081-rfi-en.pdf)

### **Additional Links:**
[Original Notice in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8309/100024081-rfi-en.pdf)
[Original Notice in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8309/100024081-rfi-fr.pdf)

### Important Messages:
- Industry stakeholders can submit feedback toward identification of interested contactors 
- All responses to the original Notice by Canada Buy and Serve are requested

### Key Initiatives or Notifications:
Note the Expire Date has already passed; there is no Call for Responses.

### Extracted Data:
#### __Canada Buy and Serve:_http://canadabuys.canada.ca
